editionStmt.p: Record edited by Emmanuel FRANCIS CNRS, CEIAS, UMR 8564.

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: Bundle (composite manuscript) made of 6 items (each consisting in 1 palm-leaf folio) of various measurements. Most items are of Christian contents. With 3 notes on paper leaves, pertaining to some of the items.

support.p: Number of stringholes varying from one item to the other. One string with lead seal.

desc.p: Paper note written in black ink. Pertaining to Indien 472a and Indien 472b and repeating the information contained in R.B. N° 4530bis (1847).

quote.p: 2 passages du N. T. en Tamoul avec la tradn en Allemand.

desc.p: Paper note written in black ink. Two hands. Pertaining to Indien 472c.

quote.p: Feuille de palmier contenant un fragment d’ouvrage tamoul, remise au Dépt des Manuscrits par le Dépt des Estampes, le 11 août 1852. [Hand #1]
(C’est une feuille de l’histoire de St François Xavier.) [Hand #2]

desc.p: Paper note written in black pencil listing 5 items. Pertaining to Indien 472d, as the item 5 in the list is the only one in Tamil and as the figure 5 is written (in black pencil?) on the left margin of the recto of Indien 472d.

quote.p: 4 un feuillet d’un ouvrage sanskrit écrit en caractères Devanagari (Table Géographique)
5 feuille de palmier langue et caractères tamoul

binding.p: Mahogany woodcovers apparently fabricated in the BnF. The front one is (unusually) partly painted in black.

origin.origDate: The various items of this composite manuscript appear to have dates ranging approximatively from possibly 1700 to 1850.

acquisition.p: Indien 472a and Indien 472b were acquired by the BnF in 1847 from Schwaighauser, "Elève de l'école des chartes", along with other items. See R.B. N° 4530bis (1847).
